name: Dog Walking: Unleashed
description:
A game about leashing, feeding, and throwing(?) dogs to get to the goal!

This was created for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam, with the theme of Joined Together. Strayed a little bit far IMO during the sleep deprived haze. Got obsessed with those buttons.

Programmed by me, I had some design help from some friends and the dogs and character was drawn by @made.bysoo on Instagram, while the rest of the assets were mostly Kenney assets
